newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: Samsung says to supply parts to Boeing.
newsitem.headline: Samsung says to supply parts to Boeing.

text.p: South Korea's Samsung Aerospace Industries Co said on Monday it had agreed to supply parts to Boeing Co to build 747-500 planes.
A Samsung statement did not put a value on the deal, saying details would be announced later.
The statement said Northrop Grumman Corp would also participate in the project to build the 500- to 600- seat planes based on Boeing's existing 747-400 model.
Samsung Aerospace, part of the Samsung Group SAGR.CN, expects to be awarded contracts worth around $200 million from the project, the statement said.
Samsung would supply such parts as fuselages and tail wings, it said.
